channel.description: Recent content in Contingency on Outlearn

item.title: Networking
item.description: Home > Outdoor activities > Nature-Based Activities > Maths-Focused Activities > Contingency Activities > Networking ‘Networking’ in life is a brilliant way to get to know others, also in this activity as well. The aim of networking is to find people who you have a link with. This allows children to better understand themselves, their environment, and how to ask the right questions. Explanation Everyone is standing and waiting for the leader to start the game.
